data.title: Standard Top Mid Smoke Fight and Market Paranoia
data.description: Coordinate a play with your teammate towards Art, allowing you guys to play more forward towards Mid.

data.title: Standard B Hold With Dark Cover + Paranoia
data.description: Delay the B Site execute with these two simple combination of utility.

data.title: Art Paranoia Hold Play
data.description: Seek a favorable fight by playing off a Sentinel's utility, or a teammate's contact, and blind your opponents.

data.title: Mid Doors Paranoia Hold Play
data.description: Seek a favorable fight by playing off a Sentinel's utility, or a teammate's contact, and blind your opponents.

data.title: Simple B Long Dark Cover Hold
data.description: Play aggressively towards the B Site with this smoke, allowing you and your teammates to set up crossfires.
